High Court quashes Darren Miller’s violence convictions after trial goes ahead without witnesses https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/high-court-overturns-darren-millers-violence-convictions-after-trial-goes-ahead-without-witnesses/VPHQ3G3NOBA6HI6N2ETPLVDY6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/high-court-overturns-darren-millers-violence-convictions-after-trial-goes-ahead-without-witnesses/VPHQ3G3NOBA6HI6N2ETPLVDY6Y/ Tara ShaskeyA witness alleged gang members threatened her life; the High Court overturns convictions. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 07:00:00 +0000 Darren Kelvin Miller was convicted of multiple violent offences against two women, which he went on to successfully appeal.
Manhunt for Samir Derek Belhajjam after he escapes from police transport vehicle outside Taupō court https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/samir-derek-belhajjam-on-the-run-after-escaping-custody-from-police-transport-vehicle-outside-taupo-court/VLMB4NTOXNDYJBQECFPCFM63ZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/samir-derek-belhajjam-on-the-run-after-escaping-custody-from-police-transport-vehicle-outside-taupo-court/VLMB4NTOXNDYJBQECFPCFM63ZM/ Belhajjam was wearing green prison-issue shorts and an orange high-vis vest. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:53:20 +0000 Police are working to locate Samir Derek Belhajjam, 30, who has escaped custody in Taupo on January 13, 2025. Picture supplied by NZ Police
Drones join helicopters, firefighters to battle Coromandel blazehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/drones-join-helicopters-firefighters-to-battle-coromandel-blaze/QLEMEVUIFRE5FNT5ELAJYH6GLQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/drones-join-helicopters-firefighters-to-battle-coromandel-blaze/QLEMEVUIFRE5FNT5ELAJYH6GLQ/ Drones with thermal imaging equipment will survey the Black Jack fireground. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:14:42 +0000 A helicopter involved in battling a vegetation fire on Black Jack Road, Kūaotunu in the Coromandel Peninsula. Photo / Coromandel's CFM
Tikanga questioned after three Prime Ministers muted at Dame Tariana Turia’s tangi – Cale Silich https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/tikanga-questioned-after- Three-prime-ministers-muted-at-dame-tariana-turias-tangi-cale-silich/VF2LMWVOQJCLTKMQ7JJ2O4DQVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/tikanga-questioned-after- Three-prime-ministers-muted-at-dame-tariana-turias-tangi-cale-silich/VF2LMWVOQJCLTKMQ7JJ2O4DQVA/ Cale SilichOPINION: Three PMs blocked from speaking at Turia's tangi, igniting tikanga controversy. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:01:21 +0000 The Government and Labour lined up to pay their respects to Dame Tariana Turia who died on Friday.
Police seize $400,000 from Air New Zealand baggage handler Matangikolo Piukana, involved in conspiracy to import methamphetamine https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-seize-400000-from-baggage-handler-matangikolo-piukana-involved-in-conspiracy-to-import-methamphetamine/BBVE6DPLFFGIHCS255A24FCLHY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-seize-400000-from-baggage-handler-matangikolo-piukana-involved-in-conspiracy-to-import-methamphetamine/BBVE6DPLFFGIHCS255A24FCLHY/ Ric StevensThe syndicate's 'logistics organiser' stored large amounts of cash at his sister's house. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Several Air New Zealand baggage handlers at Auckland Airport pleaded guilty to helping unload a secret stash of methamphetamine from an arriving Malaysian Airlines flight in 2021. Photo / Supplied
Gabriel Yad-Elohim may have been ‘acting out’ animated TV show scene when he killed Michael Mulholland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gabriel-yad-elohim-was-acting-out-scene-from-animated-tv-show-when-he-killed-michael-mulholland/QAHATIFKYVEGZFZF5TVSP2FSCQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gabriel-yad-elohim-was-acting-out-scene-from-animated-tv-show-when-he-killed-michael-mulholland/QAHATIFKYVEGZFZF5TVSP2FSCQ/ Ric StevensNew evidence, including the anime show, has been shown to Supreme Court justices. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Gabriel Hikari Yad-Elohim was a patient at Auckland District Health Board's acute mental health unit before he killed Michael Mulholland. Photo / Brett Phibbs
Health NZ says Gisborne’s ED experiencing increasing trend in demand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/health-nz-says-gisbornes-ed-experiencing-increasing-trend-in-demand/BDWPK57CWZDHNM425JEPNR4QXA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/health-nz-says-gisbornes-ed-experiencing-increasing-trend-in-demand/BDWPK57CWZDHNM425JEPNR4QXA/ Health New Zealand reassures hospital-level care is still available for those in need. Mon, 13 Jan 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Between April 1 and July 31 of 2024, there were 9045 attendances at the Gisborne Hospital Emergency Department compared to 9387 presentations between August 1 and December 1 that same year. Photo / Liam Clayton
